text: when people think about New York they
often think of Manhattan the yellow cats
cutting through the streets of massive
skyscrapers the sidewalks flooded with
businessmen street performers and
tourists the Broadway shows the dazzling
lights in Times Square but the next
borough east across the river is called
Brooklyn it's only a 20 minute subway
ride away which i think is no big deal
but the locals here will tell you the
opposite it really is like you enter a
whole new world for Akshay
Brooklyn is where you can see hipsters
sipping on Tecate beer people spray
painting the walls for fun what are you
making youngsters playing pickleball in
the park with hobos cheering them on for
or dressing up naked in the streets LGBT
flags flying high like they're top-heavy
haircut it's probably the most liberal
place in America today I'm in Brooklyn
with my best college buddy Isaac so
class he is the epitome of a Brooklyn
resident he's an underground DJ who
makes awesome funky beats on his free
time
he can do whatever he wants without
anyone judging him Isaac is gonna take
me to some of his favorite spots in his
neighborhood called Bushwick
so I can discover just how hipster this
place is even on a freezing cold Sunday
like today if cold outside Isaac got a
little beanie on now all right so we're
walking in Isaac's hood which is called
Bushwick let's start with a work cafe
called pave through the narrow green
hallway it's a great spot for young
entrepreneurs with an even better
atmosphere that I could easily work at
feeling all the mellow vibes moving on
to the streets where we saw some cool
graffiti walls and then explored the
local park all of Brooklyn feels a lot
more open and residential than Manhattan
and I love that I have room to breathe
here we landed at another cafe but this
one is like a bar meets Cafe meets
hangout spot coffee is on tap like
draught beer awesome place to chill for
an afternoon as I offered back to the
city I reminisce on a great day in
Brooklyn it really is a nice change of
pace from hectic Manhattan and I could
easily see myself living here as for now
I'm off to Washington DC I'm drew pinsky
and if you like my travel videos please
click Subscribe and join me as I planned
to visit every country in the world
